page.title: 01FOCUS ON EAST WITTERING AREA
page.content:
Our school was given an area to survey which is situated 8 miles South of Chichester,on the coastal plain of West Sussex. The 4km x 3km block consisted of three distinct and seperate physical features.
(1) The Coastal Strip. (2) The Residential Area. (3) The Farmland.
1. The coastal area surveyed consisted of a sandy,shingle beach,that faced South.The beach is safe for bathing and all the other holiday activities. It is very popular with both locals and holiday makers,for its closeness to the village and other amenities .
